metadata.title: CVE-2017-17529 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: af/util/xp/ut_go_file.cpp in AbiWord 3.0.2-2 does not validate stringsbefore launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable,which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacksvia a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: abiword: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
